episodes.title: Our INSIDE Story Being In The "Shiny Happy People" Duggar Documentary
episodes.description:
As you may have seen, we were in ep 4 of ’Shiny Happy People Duggar Family Secrets’ on Prime. We agreed to being in the doc, having been told they were looking to achieve “360 degree” coverage of the topic. They said they were not out to make us look like villains. That they wanted our perspective and to represent what it’s like to be Christian influencers. For those who’ve watched it, you can see that was not the case. Far from it. While I won’t say absolutely nothing good came from the doc, (I do believe bad actors should be called out) they intentionally turned this into an attack on all Christians. An attack on Christian homeschool families. On Christian content creators. It came after us and many other Christian creators, some of which we consider close friends and great people. In this video, we’re going into detail about what happened and our take on the docuseries. Here’s our side.
